

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
```

```{r}
for (i in 2005:2019) {
   
   assign(paste0("pa.", i),
          
          get_acs(geography = "county", 
               year = i,
               variables = c(totpop="B01001_001",
                             totpoprace="B02001_001",
                             totpopwhite="B02001_002",
                             medage="B01002_001",
                             totpopeduc="B06009_001",
                             bachdegree="B06009_005",
                             medincome="B21004_001"
                             ),
                             state = "PA",
               survey = "acs1")
          )

   
}



   
 write.csv(paste('pa', i, sep = '.'), paste("./RawData/pa", i, 'csv', sep='.'))
```
